Samsung Galaxy S25 series prices leak ahead of January 22 launch event - India Today
summary:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Prices Leak Ahead of January 22 Launch Event

Published On: Jan 18, 2025 | Published By: Aman Rashid

The Galaxy S25 series, set to launch on January 22, is anticipated to see a price increase compared to the previous Galaxy S24 lineup, with significant changes in storage and RAM configurations.

  • The Galaxy S25 base model starts at Rs 84,999, a jump from last year's Rs 74,999.
  • The Galaxy S25+ will begin at Rs 1,04,999, up from Rs 99,999.
  • Galaxy S25 Ultra's starting price is expected at Rs 1,34,999, compared to Rs 1,29,999 for the S24 Ultra.
  • The higher production costs related to the new Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset may contribute to the pricing increase.
“Whether this performance boost justifies the price increase remains to be seen.”

As the launch date nears, Samsung is accepting pre-bookings, indicating strong interest despite higher pricing expectations.
newTitle: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Pricing Expected to Rise Before Launch

title: Santosh Kamath of Franklin Templeton MF is back with a new credit alternative investment fund | Mint - Mint
summary:
Santosh Kamath of Franklin Templeton MF is back with a new credit alternative investment fund

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Mint

Santosh Kamath, the fixed-income chief at Franklin Templeton MF, returns with a new private credit alternative investment fund after dismantling six debt funds in 2020 that totaled ₹25,000 crore.

  • Kamath was responsible for managing the six debt funds when they were wound up.
  • He stepped down from his role in 2023 to lead the newly established alternatives business.
“Unlock Premium Insights in This Article”

This new development reflects a significant shift in strategy as Kamath aims to leverage alternative investment opportunities in the current market landscape.

iPhone SE 4 to launch in April 2025: Apple’s budget device with big upgrades

Publication Date: January 18, 2025

Source: India TV News

Apple is set to bring back the iPhone SE lineup after a two-year hiatus with the fourth-generation model expected to launch in April 2025, possibly rebranded as the iPhone 16e.

Key Points:

  • The iPhone SE 4 is rumored to undergo a complete design overhaul with significant upgrades.
  • Leaked images suggest a design similar to the iPhone 14.
  • Expected upgrades include a larger 6.6-inch OLED display, A18 chipset, 8GB of RAM, and a 48MP rear camera.
  • Potential rebranding as the iPhone 16e aligns it with recent high-end models.
“This move could represent a significant leap for Apple’s entry-level iPhone, positioning it as a competitive option for budget-conscious buyers.”

The iPhone SE 4 aims to cater to budget-conscious consumers while offering features that align it closely with Apple's premium devices, further enhancing its appeal in the competitive smartphone market.

summary:
Nintendo Reveals First Look at Switch 2 with Details Coming in April

January 18, 2025 / Moneycontrol

After months of teases and rumors, Nintendo has finally revealed the successor to Switch, which comes eight years after the launch of its predecessor. The company hasn’t given a release date for the Switch 2 but said it would reveal more details in April.

  • Nintendo has unveiled the new Switch 2 with a teaser video.
  • The Switch 2 is expected to launch in 2025 with a possible announcement on April 2.
  • Pricing estimates suggest a starting price of $400 to $450.
“The handheld console showcases improvements without disclosing specs or availability.”

This announcement marks a significant moment for Nintendo as it transitions to new hardware, keeping fans excited for more information.

summary:
Samsung and OpenAI Working Together to Bring ChatGPT to Smart TVs: Report

Publication Date: January 18, 2025 | Source: Indian Express

Samsung is collaborating with OpenAI to potentially integrate ChatGPT into its smart TV lineup, enhancing AI features for personalized content recommendations and user interactions.

  • Strategic partnership aims to maintain Samsung's leading position in the TV market.
  • Possibility of real-time translation of audio and subtitles.
  • Users might request personalized healthcare advice and control TV settings through ChatGPT.
  • Existing AI features on TizenOS include AI upscaling, AI Sound, and AI Vision.
  • Competition includes Google's integration of its AI chatbot, Gemini, into Google TV OS.
  • Details are still being finalized, and information may change.
"Take this information with a grain of salt since things may change down the line."

In conclusion, the collaboration could significantly upgrade user experience on Samsung smart TVs, keeping it competitive in a rapidly evolving market.

Date: January 18, 2025

Source: The Hindu

OpenAI's CEO Sam Altman announced the finalization of the 'o3 mini', a new reasoning AI model, set to launch in the upcoming weeks.

  • The 'o3 mini' is part of OpenAI's effort to enhance its AI models to tackle complex problems.
  • The API and ChatGPT will be released simultaneously, focusing on user feedback.
  • The o3 models aim to advance competition with Google in the AI domain.

  • OpenAI's previous models, the o1 series, focus on handling more complex queries effectively.

Apple pulls error-prone AI-generated news feature in beta iPhone software - Business Standard
summary:
Apple Suspends AI News Feature Due to Inaccuracies

Date: Jan 18 2025 | Source: Business Standard

Apple is suspending an error-prone feature that used artificial intelligence to deliver bogus news alerts to iPhone owners following complaints from several media organizations.

  • AI-generated news alerts were causing misinformation and erroneous headlines.
  • The feature is disabled while Apple works on fixing the underlying issues described as hallucinations.
  • This suspension impacts upcoming software versions, including iOS 18.3 for iPhones and updates for iPads and Macs.
  • High-profile mistakes have attracted attention, such as false alerts from BBC News.
  • Apple's AI initiative began with the iPhone 16, aiming to incorporate more AI in their products.
The BBC was among the media organisations that complained about the balky news summary feature after Apple sent alerts that transformed its reports into false headlines.

The temporary suspension highlights challenges Apple faces in its push into artificial intelligence and the importance of accuracy in new technology.
newTitle: Apple Suspends AI News Feature Due to Inaccuracies

title: Anand Group eyes growth as EV transition drives auto component demand | Mint - Mint
summary:
Anand Group Eyes Growth as EV Transition Drives Auto Component Demand

Publication Date: Not specified   Source: Mint

The Indian auto components maker Anand Group is gearing up for significant growth this year due to the automotive industry's accelerated shift towards electrification, despite facing some global market challenges.

  • Anand Group is focusing on electric vehicle (EV) components, highlighting increased value in thermal systems and braking solutions.
  • Group CEO Mahendra Goyal noted a six-to-seven-fold rise in per-vehicle content value for EVs compared to traditional vehicles.
  • The company has introduced new products like e-compressors and integrated thermal systems tailored for EVs.
“The value proposition for EVs is dramatically higher compared to internal combustion engines.” - Mahendra Goyal

The Anand Group demonstrates its readiness to capitalize on the growing EV market, aiming to adapt swiftly to the developments within the automotive sector.
newTitle: Anand Group Eyes Growth Driven by EV Transition

title: How to stay in the loop with Samsung's new Galaxy S25 series launch event - Pocket-lint
summary:

Publication Date: January 22, 2025

Source: Pocket-lint

Samsung's major Galaxy S25 series keynote is just around the corner, where the company will unveil the latest generation of its flagship smartphone line and new accessories. Here's how to watch the event unfold in real time.

  • Samsung's Galaxy S25 Unpacked event will be streamed online on January 22, at 1:00PM EST / 10:00AM PST.
  • You can access the live stream on the official Samsung website and its YouTube channel.
  • Expect an overview of the new Galaxy S25 series, which is rumored to include Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite and camera upgrades.

Stay tuned for this important launch event as Samsung aims to maintain its dominance in the smartphone market amidst stiff competition.
